alert.note: Alert for Mono (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:17PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL MONO COUNTY THROUGH 300 PM PDT... At 216 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mono Lake, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. Heavy rainfall could produce areas of ponding water. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Mono Lake, Lee Vining, Conway Summit, Lundy Canyon Campground, Junctions U.S 395 And CA 158 N-Ca 120 E, Junction U.S 395 And CA 167, and Lee Vining Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
